text: Jinshi shenghuo [zhu] de qingxing, haobi wo cong tiankong jiangxia de yushui, ranhou, da dishang de zhiwu yinci er fanmao shengzhang, gong renlei he shengchu shiyong. Dang da di pi shang jin zhuang, daban de meili, er zhuren renwei tamen you nengli shouhuo zhexie shi, wo de mingling [chengfa] zai heiye huo baizhou turan jianglin ta, wo shi ta bian chengle haoxiang gang shougeguo de, haoxiang zuotian weiceng fanmaoguo yiyang. Wo ruci wei neng sikao de minzhong chanming xuduo jixiang.
